## Labels: <code style='color:#28a87d;font-weight:700;'>labs()</code>

To change the labels and add a title, a subtitle, a caption and/or a tag, use `labs()`:

```{r structure-labs-1, fig.width=16, fig.height=5.3}
ggplot(data, aes(date, close, color = currency)) +
  geom_line() + 
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Closing Price", color = "Cryptocurrency") #<<
```

---

## Labels: <code style='color:#28a87d;font-weight:700;'>labs()</code>

To change the labels and add a title, a subtitle, a caption and/or a tag, use `labs()`:

```{r structure-labs-2, fig.width=16, fig.height=4.7}
ggplot(data, aes(date, close, color = currency)) +
  geom_line() + 
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Closing Price", color = "Cryptocurrency", tag = "A)", #<<
       title = "Performance of the Top 4 Cryptocurrencies", caption = "Data: CoinMarketCap.com", #<<
       subtitle = "The time series show daily closing prices from 2018 to 2020.") #<<
```
